body.name: Apple AirPods (2nd Generation) Wireless Ear Buds, Bluetooth Headphones with Lightning Charging Case Included, Over 24 Hours of Battery Life, Effortless Setup for iPhone
body.stockDetail: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: HIGH-QUALITY SOUND — Powered by the Apple H1 headphone chip, AirPods (2nd generation) deliver rich, vivid sound.

EFFORTLESS SETUP — After a simple one-tap setup, AirPods are automatically on and always connected. They sense when they’re in your ears and pause when you take them out. And sound seamlessly switches between your iPhone, Apple Watch, Mac, iPad, and Apple TV.
VOICE CONTROL WITH SIRI — Just say “Hey Siri” for assistance without having to reach for your iPhone.
24-HOUR BATTERY LIFE — More than 24 hours total listening time with the Charging Case.
AUDIO SHARING — Easily share audio between two sets of AirPods on your iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, or Apple TV.
LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more.

productInformation.name: Weight
productInformation.value: AirPods (each): 0.14 ounce (4 g), Charging Case: 1.34 ounces (38 g)

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: AirPods (each): 0.65 by 0.71 by 1.59 inches (16.5 by 18.0 by 40.5 mm), Charging Case: 1.74 by 0.84 by 2.11 inches (44.3 by 21.3 by 53.5 mm)

productInformation.name: AirPods Sensors (each):
productInformation.value: Dual beamforming microphones, Dual optical sensors, Motion-detecting accelerometer, Speech-detecting accelerometer

productInformation.name: Power and Battery
productInformation.value: AirPods with Charging Case: More than 24 hours listening time, up to 18 hours talk time; AirPods (single charge): Up to 5 hours listening time, up to 3 hours talk time or 15 minutes in the case equals up to 3 hours listening time or up to 2 hours talk time

productInformation.name: Additional Information
productInformation.value: One-tap setup, Automatic Switching, and Audio Sharing require a compatible Apple device running the latest operating system software. Device compatibility varies by feature. One-tap setup and Automatic Switching also require an iCloud account. Battery life depends on device settings, environment, usage, and many other factors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very good product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: the Apple AirPods (2nd Generation) Wireless Ear Buds are a highly recommendable product for anyone who wants a wireless ear bud that works perfectly with the iPhone and delivers sound of very good quality. I have never used ear buds before but followed the indication of my son and now I am very satisfied with my purchase and getting addicted. I bought them some weeks ago from Amazon for 99 bucks, which I considered an excellent price for the product, and now I see it is even cheaper! Congrats, Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the AirPods to replace the ones I lost! The sound is great, fits snug in my ears and I feel like the charge last longer than my last pair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you are hesitant, get it.
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to purchase it for so long although I have an iPhone, but it is a great apple product. so easy to use and connects effortlessly with iPhone and MacBook. sound quality is great but mic quality might not be the best out there, great for calls but might not be the best for recording videos. overall a very good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lifesaver for peaceful moments
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the older generation AirPods for my teenage daughter, and it has been a game-changer for our household. Now, I no longer have to endure the constant sound of TikToks blaring through the speakers. The AirPods deliver crystal-clear audio to her ears, providing me with much-needed moments of peace and quiet. The wireless convenience and reliable connection make them a perfect choice for anyone seeking an escape from the world of teenage playlists. Highly recommended for maintaining parental sanity!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These 2nd gen AirPods worked really well for me. They have a sleek design that beats other wireless earbud brands hands down. Comfort-wise, they're a winner - they stay snug even after hours of use.Some main points:Comfort: They fit perfectly and don't cause any discomfort, even during long wear.Connectivity: They connect flawlessly with my iPhone. Sometimes only one connects, but a quick reset in the case fixes it.Sound Quality: Impressive audio output for an earbud.Battery Life: Great, can use them all day without having to chargeMicrophone: Works really well during calls, offering clear communication.Customization: With an iPhone it allows you to customize the function of "double tapping on the airpod" allowing you to play next track, use siri, play/pause etc.Overall, they're a fantastic choice over other brands, providing excellent sound, reliable connection, and comfortable wear for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Apple Air pods
reviews.reviewText: These are my fav. I’ve had the ( smaller ones with the replaceable pieces) they were cool but these worked best for me. My only issue was my first pair the left pod after like a few months was very low I could barely hear out of them so I was just left with the right pod. Then I lost that one so I had to have another pair. In my opinion these fit comfortably in your ear the battery life is great I went days without charging case. Very convenient sound is great they’re just really good quality earpods. And I don’t think I’ll use any of the other ones because I love these so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Returned Gen 3 and got these
reviews.reviewText: I originally got the Gen 3 since they were a newer model but I hated the fit on my ears. They always fell out and just didn’t work. Went and tried these at the Apple Store and they fit like a globe on my ears. They don’t follow out and the functinoallity on all other apple devices is unmatched. They sound great as well honestly no difference between these and the Gen 3. So save your money and get these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love them, easy to use & work great!
reviews.reviewText: Family of four, and I was the last to get some, figuring wired Apple earbuds were just fine since I don’t use them nearly as much as the rest of the crew. Yes, I’m glad I bit the bullet and bought some during Black Friday sales. I’m a convert, I LoVe them. No more phone calls where I can’t move around because I’ve got wet or dirty hands and I’m attached to my phone that’s on the counter; I can listen to music and go room to room since they have a good range; and no more tangled wires getting stuck on a drawer knob and clotheslining me while I’m working in the kitchen or laundry room.This is the sixth pair purchased by my family over a long period of time. One pair was lost; one of them had a sound failure of the left ear after about a year of constant daily use (my son listens to music while he’s working or is chatting with friends, and I don’t know how well he treated them) his second set has lasted him about 2 years so far. We are all very happy with the sound quality and they’re easy to use and pair to a cell phone. I did look up a quick YouTube how-to but it was painless and simple. So far so good and I honestly wish now I hadn’t waited so long!
